report.title: Report of Hospitalization
report.author: Yosefxp
report.bodytext: A really good friend of mine recently took about 30mg of 5-MeO-AMT. It hit him within 15 minutes and while he was in a public place he caused a scene and had to be restrained by the police. /n /n t + 1h: They took him to the cells. He was foaming at the mouth, unable to be communicated with and was throwing himself against the walls. /n /n t + 14: he lost consciousness and had to be taken into the intensive care unit and put on life support. /n /n t + 24: he was placed into a regular ward with possible kindey damage due to enzymes from his muscles clogging everything up. /n /n t + 3d: he is still in the hospital, kidneys have gotten worse and we can't yet rule out brain damage at this point. /n /n All he can remember is sitting in the car and the next thing he was in the hospital with a respirator. /n /n Please take this as a warning...DO NOT TRY THIS DRUG! There are way better drugs out there which are far more safer. Give 5-MeO-AMT a miss.
